alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Nassau and northeastern Duval Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Yulee to 8 miles northeast of Callahan. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Yulee, Nassau Village-Ratliff, Ratliff and Oceanway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
